entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers near noon. Fog dissipating this morning. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 15 January 2023
